company_context: Apex BioSolutions is a fast‑growing, publicly‑traded biotech company (NASDAQ: APXB) focused on next‑generation cell‑based immunotherapies for oncology and autoimmune diseases. The firm has $1.2 B in annual revenue, $850 M in cash, and a pipeline that includes two FDA‑approved CAR‑T products and three candidates in Phase 2. The executive team is preparing the 2025‑2027 strategic plan to decide on a new CAR‑NK platform, allocate a $200 M R&D budget, and set company‑wide OKRs aligned with a five‑year vision of becoming the market leader in off‑the‑shelf cell therapies.
meeting_event_details: Dates: Thursday June 10 2025 – Saturday June 12 2025 (3 days). Time: 8:30 am – 5:30 pm each day, with a half‑day off on Saturday (8:30 am – 12:30 pm). Location: The Lodge at Snowy River, 1450 Aspen Road, Aspen, Colorado (full‑board resort with conference facilities, high‑speed Wi‑Fi, and breakout rooms). The agenda includes market trend deep‑dives, competitive landscape workshops, visioning sessions, OKR formulation, and decision‑making panels.

deliverables: Executive Summary Deck (10‑slide) capturing vision, strategic priorities, and OKRs
Detailed 3‑Year Financial Model (2025‑2027) with scenario analysis for new CAR‑NK platform
Competitive Landscape Matrix (incl. 12 global rivals, SWOT, market share forecasts)
R&D Portfolio Allocation Plan (budget split, milestones, go/no‑go gates)
Partnership & M&A Playbook (target criteria, deal pipeline, integration roadmap)
Action‑Item Tracker (owner, due date, KPI) for all decisions made
Board Briefing Package (full report + Q&A FAQ) to be delivered within 5 business days
success_criteria: All 5 strategic priorities are defined, ranked, and assigned owners by end of day 2
Consensus on 2025‑2026 OKRs achieved with ≥90 % alignment score in post‑session survey
Decision on CAR‑NK platform (go/no‑go) documented with supporting financial model and risk register
R&D budget allocation approved and signed off by CFO and CEO before day 3 close
Post‑offsite communication plan executed: executive summary sent to Board within 48 hours, town‑hall scheduled within 2 weeks, and action‑item tracker shared with all owners within 24 hours
constraints: Total offsite budget capped at $150 K (venue, travel, facilitator fees, materials)
All pre‑work (market research, financial analysis, customer insights) must be submitted to the facilitator by May 28 2025
Key external advisors have limited availability – must be scheduled for 2‑hour slots on June 10 and 11
Regulatory compliance: any discussion of unpublished data must be marked confidential and stored on encrypted drives
Travel restrictions: all attendees must have COVID‑19 vaccination proof and negative test within 72 hours of departure
workback_prompt: Generate a detailed work‑back plan for the Apex BioSolutions 2025 Strategic Planning Offsite (June 10‑12, 2025, Aspen, CO). Include all pre‑work deliverables (market research, financial models, SWOT, customer insights), facilitator preparation, agenda‑by‑hour, logistics (travel, lodging, tech setup), decision‑gate reviews, post‑offsite communication (Board brief, town‑hall, action‑item tracker), and risk mitigation steps. Align tasks with the constraints (budget $150K, pre‑work deadline May 28, external advisor availability) and success criteria (priority definition, OKR consensus, CAR‑NK decision, budget sign‑off, communication rollout). Output a timeline with owners, due dates, dependencies, and required resources.
